Title: Extend Auto-Formula Coverage
Description: Extend formulas from 100 rows to 1000 rows using ARRAYFORMULA. Current limitation requires manual formula addition beyond row 100.
Resolution/Notes: Replace individual setFormula calls with ARRAYFORMULA implementations

Title: Optimize Seed Data Performance
Description: Improve batch processing with better progress indicators and caching. Current execution takes 2-3 minutes for 20k members.
Resolution/Notes: Use SpreadsheetApp.flush() strategically; add progress toasts every 500 rows

Title: Implement Data Pagination
Description: Add pagination to analytics sheets to improve load times with large datasets. Currently all data loads at once.
Resolution/Notes: Create Show More buttons; use QUERY with LIMIT and OFFSET

Title: Add Caching Layer
Description: Cache Analytics Data sheet calculations for 10x faster dashboard loads.
Resolution/Notes: Store calculated values in hidden sheet; refresh on data change triggers

Title: Add Member Search Functionality
Description: Implement searchable member directory with autocomplete to reduce lookup time by 90%.
Resolution/Notes: Add search dialog with filters by name ID location unit; add keyboard shortcuts

Title: Create Quick Actions Menu
Description: Add right-click context menu for common actions (Start Grievance View History Email).
Resolution/Notes: Implement onSelectionChange trigger with context-aware menu options

Title: Implement Keyboard Shortcuts
Description: Add keyboard navigation for power users (Ctrl+N: New grievance Ctrl+M: Member directory etc.).
Resolution/Notes: Create keyboard event handlers for common operations

Title: Add Undo/Redo Functionality
Description: Track changes with undo stack to provide rollback for accidental changes.
Resolution/Notes: Store last 10 operations in Archive sheet; add Undo Last Action menu item

Title: Enhanced ADHD Features
Description: Add focus mode reading guide color-coded deadlines Pomodoro timer integration.
Resolution/Notes: Expand current ADHD features with additional accessibility options

Title: Mobile-Optimized Views
Description: Create mobile-friendly dashboard with single-column layout and larger touch targets.
Resolution/Notes: Design mobile-specific views for field use cases

Title: Dark Mode Support
Description: Add dark theme option to reduce eye strain.
Resolution/Notes: Create DARK_COLORS constant; apply theme to all sheets

Title: Add Email Validation
Description: Validate email format phone format and date ranges to ensure cleaner data.
Resolution/Notes: Use requireTextMatchesPattern for email/phone validation

Title: Implement Change Tracking
Description: Track all data modifications with audit trail showing timestamp user field old/new values.
Resolution/Notes: Create onEdit trigger to log changes to Change Log sheet

Title: Add Duplicate Detection
Description: Prevent duplicate member IDs and grievance IDs with auto-generation of next available ID.
Resolution/Notes: Check existing IDs before insertion; show warning dialog on duplicate

Title: Data Quality Dashboard
Description: Monitor data completeness with percentage of required fields filled and quality score.
Resolution/Notes: Show data quality metrics; highlight missing critical data

Title: Referential Integrity Checks
Description: Validate foreign keys to ensure Member IDs exist before creating grievances.
Resolution/Notes: Check Member ID existence; validate Steward assignments; warn on orphaned records

Title: Automated Deadline Notifications
Description: Email alerts for approaching deadlines with escalation to managers.
Resolution/Notes: Time-driven trigger (daily 8 AM); email stewards 7 days before; escalate 3 days before

Title: Batch Operations
Description: Add bulk update capabilities (assign steward update status export PDF email).
Resolution/Notes: Create batch operation dialogs for common bulk tasks

Title: Automated Report Generation
Description: Schedule monthly/quarterly reports with automatic generation and email distribution.
Resolution/Notes: Time-driven trigger (1st of month); generate PDF; email to leadership

Title: Workflow State Machine
Description: Enforce grievance workflow rules to ensure process compliance.
Resolution/Notes: Define valid state transitions; block invalid changes; require notes

Title: Smart Auto-Assignment
Description: Intelligent steward assignment based on workload location expertise and availability.
Resolution/Notes: Balance workload; match by location/unit; consider expertise

Title: Template System
Description: Pre-built grievance templates for common issue types with auto-fill capabilities.
Resolution/Notes: Create template library; customizable placeholders

Title: Predictive Analytics
Description: Predict grievance outcomes based on historical patterns and similar cases.
Resolution/Notes: Analyze win/loss patterns; identify success factors; provide risk scores

Title: Trend Analysis & Forecasting
Description: Identify patterns over time with month-over-month comparisons and volume forecasting.
Resolution/Notes: Month-over-month comparisons; seasonal patterns; early warning system

Title: Custom Report Builder
Description: User-defined reports with drag-and-drop field selection and custom filters.
Resolution/Notes: Build report designer interface; save templates; schedule recurring reports

Title: Benchmark Comparisons
Description: Compare performance against industry standards with percentile rankings.
Resolution/Notes: Upload benchmark data; side-by-side comparisons; gap analysis

Title: Root Cause Analysis
Description: Identify systemic issues by clustering similar grievances and analyzing common factors.
Resolution/Notes: Cluster analysis; correlation visualization; intervention recommendations

Title: Real-Time Dashboard Updates
Description: Live data refresh with auto-update every 5 minutes.
Resolution/Notes: Update dashboards on data change; WebSocket-style updates via triggers

Title: Google Calendar Integration
Description: Sync deadlines to Google Calendar with color-coding by priority.
Resolution/Notes: Create calendar events for deadlines; update on status changes

Title: Email Integration (Gmail)
Description: Send/receive grievance emails with tracking and template library.
Resolution/Notes: Email PDFs directly; track opens; auto-log communications

Title: Google Drive Integration
Description: Attach documents to grievances with version control and auto-organization.
Resolution/Notes: Link Drive folders; upload evidence; organize by grievance ID

Title: Slack/Teams Integration
Description: Real-time notifications with bot commands for quick queries.
Resolution/Notes: Post updates to channels; notify on deadlines; allow status updates from chat

Title: API Layer
Description: RESTful API for external access with authentication.
Resolution/Notes: Google Apps Script Web App; GET/POST/PUT endpoints; API key auth

Title: Zapier/Make.com Integration
Description: Connect to 1000+ apps via webhooks.
Resolution/Notes: Webhooks for data changes; trigger actions in other apps

Title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
Description: Install as app on mobile devices for native experience.
Resolution/Notes: HTML service interface; manifest.json; service worker; responsive design

Title: Offline Mode
Description: Work without internet with local storage cache and sync.
Resolution/Notes: Local storage cache; sync when online; conflict resolution

Title: SMS Notifications
Description: Text alerts for critical items via Twilio integration.
Resolution/Notes: Twilio integration; SMS for overdue; opt-in/opt-out management

Title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
Description: Implement permission levels (Admin Steward Member Viewer).
Resolution/Notes: Define role permissions; protect sensitive operations

Title: Smart Member Import Feature
Description: Create an import feature that smartly imports member log information from another uploaded document. Should parse and map fields intelligently from CSV/Excel uploads.
Resolution/Notes: Support CSV and Excel; field mapping UI; duplicate detection; preview before import

Title: Nuke Safety Mode - Data Protection
Description: When nuke is enabled and data cleaned: prevent bulk data deletion or alteration in Grievance Log and Member Directory. New data entry still permitted. Protects production data from accidental mass changes.
Resolution/Notes: Add NUKE_SAFETY_MODE flag; block batch delete/edit operations; allow single-row inserts

Title: Audit Logging
Description: Track all access and changes with 7-year retention.
Resolution/Notes: Log opens and modifications; store IP timestamp user

Title: PII Protection
Description: Protect sensitive member data with encryption and masking.
Resolution/Notes: Encrypt sensitive fields; mask in exports; GDPR/CCPA compliance

Title: Data Backup & Recovery
Description: Automated backups with one-click restore.
Resolution/Notes: Daily backup to separate sheet; 30-day version history; export to Drive

Title: Session Management
Description: Track active users with row locking and concurrent edit warnings.
Resolution/Notes: Show current viewers; lock rows being edited; session timeout

Title: Interactive Tutorial
Description: In-app guided tour for first-time users.
Resolution/Notes: Walkthrough; highlight features; interactive steps

Title: Video Tutorials
Description: Screen recordings for common tasks (2-3 min each).
Resolution/Notes: Creating grievance; running reports; managing workload; using dashboard

Title: Context-Sensitive Help
Description: Help button on each sheet with explanations and links.
Resolution/Notes: ? icon on each sheet; explain purpose; list common tasks

Title: FAQ Database
Description: Searchable knowledge base with voting and community contributions.
Resolution/Notes: Categorize by topic; search functionality; vote on answers

Title: Release Notes
Description: Track version changes with auto-notification on updates.
Resolution/Notes: Create CHANGELOG sheet; auto-notify; highlight new features
